data.text:
@AlexRuebben @SheelaghG Enjoy the world you're helping create because eventually you will say something, or have an opinion that gets censored.

Useful idiots will cheer.
@NewRandomGeek @SheelaghG In Russia there is misinformation, unfortunately in Ukraine bombs are falling, invite you to go there.
@NewRandomGeek @SheelaghG Discrimination by association is against the Equalities Act so why are MPs getting away with it?

@NewRandomGeek All good practice for manipulating a population.

Convenient isn't it?
